title: Do you like spam?
body: If you would like <a href="http://redwolves2.myftp.org/blog/archive/2004/04/27/264.aspx">spam</a> (be it <a href="http://www.tonicusa.com/">Tonic</a> or <a href="http://www.protonradio.com">techno</a> related), be sure and send my buddy <a title="Synja" href="http://www.livejournal.com/users/synja/" >Jon</a> your email address.  You can contact him at: <a href="mailto:info@tonicusa.com">info@tonicusa.com</a> or <a href="mailto:jonathan@protonradio.com">jonathan@protonradio.com</a> or <a href="mailto:jhart@navistream.com">jhart@navistream.com</a> or <a href="mailto:synjawork@hotmail.com">synjawork@hotmail.com</a> or <a href="mailto:hart@brandlogic.com">hart@brandlogic.com</a>.<br><br>...the only way to describe it is with a Brasky quote: <a href="http://travis.servebeer.com/blog.net/archive/2003/08/27/376.aspx">"He hated Mexicans! And he was half Mexican! .......And he hated irony!"</a>
bodyArticleHtml:
2004-04-27

Do you like spam?

If you would like
